entries.name: Age
entries: The Night God grants you long life. His followers mature at the same rate as humans but can live to be 200 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Nagbloed have turned their back on the Sun Goddess, but they still follow the Night God’s precepts. They tend to be lawful. However, their lust for power draws them towards Evil.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Walk in Shadows
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Sanguis and Abyssal.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Armor Training
entries: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Slithering Shadow
entries: Your movement speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Assassin Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item dagger|phb}, {@item rapier|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Dark Knowledge
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Arcana} skill.

entries.name: Dark Resistance
entries: You have resistance against necrotic damage.

entries.name: Erudite
entries: You learn one extra language.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dagbloeds mature at the same rate as humans and can easily live for a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Respectful of laws and traditions, Dagbloed tend towards Lawful. Their indifference towards the material world usually makes them Neutral.

entries.name: Size
entries: Dagbloeds are easily over 6 feet tall and their build is similar to humans'. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Divine Magic
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip.

entries.name: Blood Thirst
entries: Your kind may be peaceful, but you have not forgotten the instincts that gave them their name. Calling upon the Night God, you can go back to these savage ways. When attacking with a melee weapon, you can use a bonus action to consume the blood spilt by the enemy to gain temporary HP equal to your wisdom modifier. Once you’ve used this feature, you can’t use it again util you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sanguis.

entries.name: Martial Training
entries: You are proficient with two {@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} of your choice and with light and medium armor.

entries.name: Scholar
entries: You gain proficiency with one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Insight}, {@skill History}, {@skill Religion}, {@skill Arcana}, or {@skill Nature}.

entries.name: Erudite
entries: You learn one extra language.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kalar reach adulthood around 10 years old and can live for well over a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Life on an airship is strict, and Kalar have an ingrained sense of discipline drawing them towards Lawful alignments. They teach their young the value of compassion and solidarity early on, and most Kalar tend to be Good.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Used to survey the skies day and night, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kalar usually stand between 3 and 4 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is small.

entries.name: Tiny wings
entries: Small wings sprout from your back with a wingspan of 1 foot, granting you a flying speed of 30 feet. You must land at the end of every turn or fall.

entries.name: Speak with small beasts
entries: Through sound and gestures, you may communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.

entries.name: Size
entries: You are proficient with {@item Navigator's tools|phb}

entries.name: Storm diver
entries: You have resistance to Thunder damage

entries.name: Bookworm
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill History} skill.

entries.name: Natural Tinkerer
entries: You know the {@spell mending} cantrip.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Common, Kalari and one other language of your choice. Kalari is the language of the Kalar, a fast-paced flowing language rich in vowels and short words. It is written using Celestial script
